mapper.insert: INSERT INTO message (senderId, receiverId, content, sendDate) VALUES (#{senderId}, #{receiverId}, #{content}, now());
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM message where receiverId = #{receiverId} AND isReceiverDeleted = false;
SELECT * FROM message where senderId = #{senderId} AND isSenderDeleted = false;
mapper.update: update message SET isRead = true, readDate = now() WHERE `index` = #{index};
